title: Why is Yi able to kill me in two autos at 1.5 items?
body:
This isnt even a "yi is op" thread (i do think he is but thats not the point). Im legitimately asking how Yi is able to kill me from full HP and barrier with Q + AA + AA when he has 1.5 items. 

It literally does not make sense to me how he gets {{item:3124}} + {{item:1041}} + {{item:1038}} and then procedes to kill me in 0.5 seconds at level 10.

If anyone knows please tell me bc i dont understand this

replies.body: Simple: he can't and didn't, stop making shit up. I don't even need to go into the math on this, that's OBVIOUSLY impossible.
How fucking far behind were you.

> [{quoted}](name=Automated Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0dANcVoE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-10T22:47:29.490+0000)
>
> How fucking far behind were you.

I was 4/4 and level 12. He was 2/3 and level 10.

Then there is no way he killed you from full in two autos. If that is the case there has to be a bug. Even if he had 200 ad with fully stocked guinsoos and double strike, that's only like 600 damage. (probably an overestimation) I wanna see a video of this claim.

> [{quoted}](name=Automated Riven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0dANcVoE,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-06-10T22:58:30.561+0000)
>
> Then there is no way he killed you from full in two autos. If that is the case there has to be a bug. Even if he had 200 ad with fully stocked guinsoos and double strike, that's only like 600 damage. (probably an overestimation) I wanna see a video of this claim.

Okay, will make a clip and post it
or how ahead was the yi

> [{quoted}](name=meowwow7,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0dANcVoE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-10T22:48:36.631+0000)
>
> or how ahead was the yi

He was 2/3/3 and i was a 4/4 lux

I think there might be a bug in League, that seems to have something to do with conqueror upping damage more than it should, because the other day I had a level 2 Irelia with a Corrupting Pot. hit me with a stun, then two Qs after procing Conqueror.  The first hit me for a reasonable 71 damage which I still thought was a bit high, the second one hit me for 223 mixed damage and basically one shot the last slight over quarter of my HP I had left.  Both of us were stunned (she literally stopped moving for several seconds and just stood there) and I have not been able to find a way for her to possibly have hit for so much.  Even assuming that the first hit proced her Conqueror, and not the AA before it which I had thought triggered it, I could not find a way for her to fit 223 damage within a single q at level 2, even with Conqueror, Scorch (which I don't even know/think she took) the bonus AD from conqueror, her fully stacked passive, etc, I could not find a way for it to be hitting for more than 110-120 damage, or about half of what I took.  Perhaps under certain circumstances the first hit after conqueror is getting doubled?
Ye well , I play Ahri a lot , and everytime he dive me and I land charm and full combo then he he leaves safely and q a minion to avoid last turrent hit

seems like a no brainer esp if he ulted adding in double hit passive and rageblade 
did you build hybrid (hp/armor) items or s/t?  is that why it's unbelievable? ____
